body: In short the guy from leftover a few years into the future is working at a company that is run by a woman who acts like the employee's older sister, after a drinking party one of the employee's Ms. Oba tells she's divorced and the boss thinks she and the MC is a perfect match so she tries to hook the two up together. The MC on the other hand say's no and eventually confesses that he's never been in a relationship and only has a single sexual experience. So the boss wants to give him confidence, short sex scene with her, and then comes up with a plan that she will drug the two of them with aphrodisiacs and then she will coach the MC over the phone how to seduce and have sex with Ms. Oba. They then at the end get discovered Ms. Oba get's mad and then 2 months later it's found out she's pregnant the MC and her get's engaged and then the MC thinks something like maybe it was always meant for me to get connected with her or something.
總算輪到男主角你有美少女老婆了
Seems like a different story in general
was this the Leftover guy? still pathetic af tho.
